title: Growing Potatoes The Cheap and Easy Way!

tasks.task: Planting seed potatoes in a garden.
subtasks: Gather necessary materials (seed potatoes, compost, Miracle Gro, topsoil).
Prepare soil by mixing compost, Miracle Gro, and topsoil.
Arrange boxes or containers for planting.
Carefully place seed potatoes in containers, covering them with soil.

Check garden progress (cabbages, oregano, thyme, Mexican mint, cilantro, parsley, broccoli, Brussels sprouts, radishes, spinach, lettuce, carrots, beets, turnips, swiss chard) for signs of growth and pest infestations.
Address pest issues, such as treating plants affected by bugs.
Monitor garden for continued growth and health, reporting progress via video updates.
Discuss plans for starting seedlings indoors for future planting.
